name: Superhero Movie Universe Simulator
description:
Do you enjoy Superhero Movie Universes? Only those which do not get too dramatic? Or only those which are not too quippy?

Try your hand at producing your very own Superhero Movie Universe! You decide who fights which villain and with whom. The most important part is to balance the different customer’s needs. Make the movies too close to the comic books, and you lose mass appeal. Make them too movie-esque and you lose the biggest fans.

Are your movies getting too happy? Kill off beloved characters to get the drama value back up. However, then you cannot use them in future movies...

Try to produce as many movies as possible, or set out to fulfill specific achievements like setting up the iconic fight between “Mashed Potato” and his nemesis “Dark Potato”.

Best played in portrait, on touch screen or desktop. If the game is too big, remember you can scale on all browsers with CTRL and +/- keys.
